description: This course is for everyone who is in some way unhappy with his or her life. This has a collection of simple methods that one can use every day to make their life better. I have included presentations and exercises that will help my students learn as well as practice the concepts taught.This course is going to take not more than 3 hours. This course is designed in a way that makes the learning simple as all the ideas that are covered in the course are put into separate lectures. All the lessons are connected to each other that creates a flow from beginning to end and I recommend my students to not skip any of the lectures as each one of them contains valuable lessons, advise and usable methods that have the power the change your life from dissatisfaction to fulfillment. This course is specially designed for you with practical tips and no whimsical theories and ideas. I assure you that if you use the methods and ideas given the course, you will not only gain happiness but also get closer to your goals and would become a more confident person.
title: How to live a Happier Life
